name: Kualotl
description: The Sun God (Jaguar) and the moon goddess (Rabbit) work together at the top of the World Tree. When the tree becomes ill and gets too weak to support the heavy jaguar climbing its branches, the Rabbit ventures into the dangerous root system to discover the cause of the tree's illness, she has to escape foxes and navigate the roots to make it to the heart of the root system, where the night god is waiting upon her arrival.
